cards.rules_text:
Shadow [i](This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)[/i]
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Menace
Bands with non-legends
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once he saw the injustice of the people, he rallied them against their oppressors[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature, create that many 1/1 white and red Human Soldier creature tokens.
You can have up to ten copies of Ravnican Titan in your deck

Enchant Creature
When this aura enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature dies, if it was dealt combat damage this turn, draw X cards, where X is enchanted creature's power.

Fear [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, defending player sacrifices a creature.

First strike
Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Even the devils of Avernus trembled as the barbed devil passed by.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever three or more creatures with flying attack, put a +1/+1 counter on up to three creatures you control.

Haste
At the beginning of your end step, exile this creature. For as long as it's in exile, you may cast it, and it costs {2} less to cast.

This creature enters tapped with an indestructible counter on it.
{T}, Sacrifice this: Move all counters from this artifact onto another permanent you control.

{2}, {T}: Choose a basic land type among lands you control. Target creature you control gains landwalk of that type until end of turn. [i](That creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of the chosen type)[/i]

When this Equipment enters, attach it to target creature you control.
Protection from everything.
Equipped creature gets +0/+8.
When equipped creature is dealt combat damage by an opponent's creature, tap that creature and put ten stun counters on it.
Equip {4}

Reach
When this creature dies, search your library for a basic land, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Whenever this creature deals combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{G}: Regenerate this creature. [i](The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, if another creature with lesser power is attacking, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Vigilance
Whenever this creature blocks a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Each player mills three times X cards. For each nonland card put into a graveyard in this way, that card's owner loses 2 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a legendary card. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

Rampage 2 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)[/i]
This creature must be blocked if able.
Whenever it deals combat damage to a creature, both you and that creature's controller create a tapped Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Vihaan did too well in waking all the gold.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Shroud
This creature can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: [i]For all those who had tried, none had ever caught him.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it wasn't blocked, you lose that much life and create that many Food tokens.

Cumulative Upkeep — Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature you control.
Trample
Whenever one or more -1/-1 counters are put on a creature, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.

{T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
Remove any number of charge counters from this artifact: Each creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each charge counter removed from this artifact in this way.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In his wanderings, Pavel set up sculptures to help those in need.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This instant deals 2 damage to any target.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 3. Then, for each card put on the bottom of your library, each player draws a card.
When this creature enters or attacks, fateseal 1. [i](Look at the top card of an opponent's library, then you may put it on the bottom of that player's library.)[/i]

Flanking [i](Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

Trample
Phasing [i](This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The tribes never knew where it went, but they definitely knew when it appeared in the middle of their camp.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Cumulative Upkeep — Phase out a nontoken creature you control.
Whenever a creature phases in, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. If both creatures survive, create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

Flash
When this artifact enters, exile target creature until this artifact leaves the battlefield.
{6}{W}{W}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put the exiled card onto the battlefield under your control.

Destroy target creature.
Draw a card.

Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them
Slivers you control have “{T}: Add {G}”

[i]“How have they gotten into the trees?”
—Nissa Rivane[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Fireburst deals 13 damage to all creatures. Until end of turn, whenever a creature dealt damage by Fireburst dies, draw a card.
Cycling {3}{R} [i]({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
When you cycle Fireburst, it deals 1 damage to each creature and player. Until end of turn, whenever a creature dealt damage by Fireburst dies, draw a card.

Echo {2}{B}{B} [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)[/i]
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, destroy target creature.

Exile up to three target creatures, then return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. If you put at least two creatures you control onto the battlefield this way, untap those creatures. Untap up to four lands.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a verse counter on this enchantment.
{2}{W}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of verse counters on this enchantment
At the beginning of your end step, if your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, if this enchantment is an enchantment, it becomes a 4/4 white Human Cleric with lifelink.

{T}: Add {C}
{5}: This land becomes a 5/5 Construct artifact creature with “{T}: Add {C}{C}.” in addition to its other types.
Target creature gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. If an opponent controls that creature, put a stun counter on it.

Horsemanship [i](This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)[/i]
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature.

Fading 3 [i](This permanent enters with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, each player loses life equal to the number of counters on this enchantment. Then if there are no counters on this enchantment, you gain 10 life.

Haste
[i]Domain[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact [i](You may sacrifice an artifact in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Coinshot deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead Coinshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

If it isn't your turn, untap target creature you control.
Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
Flashback {3}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

When this creature enters or dies, surveil 3. For each land or creature card put into a graveyard in this way, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. [i](To surveil 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

When this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
[i]Threshold[/i] — As long as there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, this creature can't be blocked.

First strike
When this creature enters, exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card this turn.
Madness {1}{R} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Trample
Amplify 2 [i](As this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Human and/or Druid card you reveal in your hand.)[/i]

When this creature enters or is turned face up, return target creature with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
Morph {4}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)[/i]

Double strike
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

When this creature enters, target opponent creates three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Provoke [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)[/i]

Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. Copies become tokens.)[/i]
Haste

[i]Imprint[/i] — When this creature enters, you may exile a card from your hand.
If the exiled card has an odd mana value, this creature can't be blocked by creatures with an odd mana value. The same is true of even mana value.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The rabbit hopped over everything. Well... almost everything.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Affinity for enchantments [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control.)[/i]
Look at the top X cards, where X is equal to twice the number of enchantments you have. Put two of them into your hand, then exile the rest.

Choose one — 
• You may reveal an instant or sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Final Gambit.
• Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
Entwine {R}{R} [i](Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)[/i]

Vigilance
{W}{W},{T}: Put a lifelink counter on target creature.
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The moon, though it caused insanity, had the last of its essence corralled in a construct by the Tarkiri.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Modular X [i](This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)[/i]
Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Add one mana of any color. Activate only during your main phase and only once each turn.

Sunburst [i](This enters with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of charge counters on this artifact.

Bushido 4 [i](Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn.)[/i]
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices that many creatures.

Soulshift 5 [i](When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)[/i]
When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

Target creature phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
Splice onto instant or sorcery {3}{W} [i](As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)[/i]

This creature can't be blocked.
If this creature entered from your hand while attacking, it becomes a copy of a creature you own that left the battlefield this turn, except it has “This creature can't be blocked.”
Ninjutsu {3}{U} [i]({3}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]

Creature Offering [i](You may cast this spell as though it had flash by sacrificing a Creature and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Creature. Mana cost includes color.)[/i]
Trample
When this creature enters, put a number of +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the sacrificed creature's power. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.

Lifelink
[i]Channel[/i] — {W}, Discard this creature: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

— Kousei Arima[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Epic [i](For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of creatures you control.

As an additional cost to cast this creature, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
[i]Sweep[/i] — When this creature enters, return any number of Islands you control to their owner's hand. Draw that many cards, then put that many lands from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Convoke [i](Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)[/i]
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped, then create a 1/1 green Human Ranger with reach for each basic land you control.

Dredge 4 [i](If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)[/i]
{2}{WB}{WB}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put an indestructible counter on target creature you control. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Though they thought it holy, it drew from the life force of the damned.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Radiance[/i] — {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Put a stun counter on target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

Menace
{B}{R}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return this creature to the battlefield under your control.
Transmute {1}{B}{R} [i]({1}{B}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Bloodthirst 2 [i](If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
When this creature enters, choose target creature an opponent controls. If that creature was dealt damage this turn, this creature deals damage equal to its power to that creature's controller. Otherwise, this creature fights that creature.

Haunt [i](When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)[/i]
When this creature enters or the creature it haunts dies, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The silver inside it infects all those it haunts.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor_text: [i]A freak accident during Ral's storm gave him vision of the weave itself.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Graft 5 [i](This creature enters with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)[/i]
Whenever you move a counter from this creature to another creature, this creature deals X damage to target creature, where X is equal to 7 minus the number of counters on this permanent. If there are no counters on this, it deals 7 damage to any target instead.

Haste
[i]Hellbent[/i] — As long as you have no cards in hand, whenever this creature attacks, create a Junk token and this creature gains first strike until end of turn. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
